how to identify

how to evaluate

how to prioritize

how best to

				agency.

shall assist executive agencies in the identification and
				disposal of excess real property.

transfer or

text.#text: The

The geographic

The number of days
				each Federal real property is designated as excess, surplus, underutilized, or
				unutilized.

The annual

The replacement
				value of each Federal real property.
